channel.title: Display Scaling - no exe
channel.description:
Just wondering if anyone can help me get this figured out.
As far as I can tell, this game doesn't have an *exe? Trouble is, I need to disable display scaling for every game, through the properties in the *exe, otherwise I have a 2 inch black border around the games for some dumb reason.
Any idea how I can fix this for Black Mesa?

item.title: Display Scaling - no exe
item.dc:creator: tomtom
item.description:
Yeah I tried that, it’s not doing anything

Read full topic
